fields.description:
What Erpnext do with this parameter. Ask means to ask for the value of the parameter before make the report.
Automatic means that Erpnext will fill it for you.
fields.label: Parameter Action

fields.description:
Is this param indication of Single, Duplicated or Triplicate for the number of copies or is for where clause.
If you select "Other" you must give the value or it will be ignored.
fields.label: Type
fields.options:
Is for copies
Is for where clause
Is for page number
Is for server hook
Other

fields.description: Describe this parameter. The description will be used if the parameter is of action 'Ask' to describe the parameter.
fields.label: Description

fields.description:
Choose the expression to use: 
In - to include all the selected ids.
Not in - to exclude the selected ids.
fields.label: Parameter Expression

fields.description:
Set the default value for the parameter. This value will be used if no other value is given. If the parameter is for where clause and you need to pass multiple values then separate them with comma. Ex. Administrator, Guest. Note: Do not put quotation marks or apostrophe in the names.
For the other cases pass them as needed by Jasper Report.
fields.label: Parameter Value
